objects.text:
• Sleek design with digital displays
• Energy-efficient smart technology
• Multiple wash cycles and settings
OFFER ENDS SOON! GRAB THE SAVINGS!

product_details.name: Insignia Modern Front-Load Washer & Dryer Set - Ultimate Laundry Duo
product_details.description:
• Sleek white design with modern digital displays and intuitive controls
• Large capacity front-load washer with multiple wash cycles and settings
• Energy-efficient dryer with advanced moisture sensing technology
• Digital LED display shows remaining cycle time and settings
• Multiple temperature settings for both washer and dryer
• Convenient front-loading design for easy access
• Stackable design option to save space
• Quiet operation with advanced noise reduction technology
• Easy-to-use control dial for cycle selection
• Durable construction with premium materials
• Smart features including custom cycle programming
• High-efficiency washing system saves water and energy

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern and clean layout divided into two distinct sections: a gradient blue left side and a light gray right side. The left panel includes all the promotional information, while the right showcases a realistic image of a washer and dryer set ("product_image"). The top begins with an urgency-driven tagline ("tagline") in white techno-style uppercase text, followed by a bold, attention-grabbing decorated sale announcement ("heading") in orange. The product name and features ("subheading" and "description") are presented in a stacked text format for clarity.

A vibrant circular price badge ("price_background") houses the price ("price") in large, white text and the discount percentage ("discount") below it. Beside it sits a supportive product label ("product_name"). The call-to-action button ("cta_background") sits near the bottom in white with contrasting blue text ("cta"), prompting immediate engagement. Decorative circles and dividers enhance visual hierarchy and balance. A subtle line of urgency text ("urgency_text") is placed near the bottom.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #2C3E50
- Teal Gradient: #4CA1AF
- Bright Orange: #FF5733
- Soft Orange: #FF8C33
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
- Slate Gray: #F5F5F5
product_color: The product image features a modern washer and dryer duo, primarily in a clean, minimalistic white (#FFFFFF) that conveys cleanliness and simplicity. Black (#000000) is used for the door trim and control panels, creating strong visual contrast and drawing attention to the key functional areas. The display panels incorporate a sharp electric blue (#00BFFF) for digital time indicators, giving a futuristic touch. Chrome or metallic silver (#C0C0C0) accents on the dials provide a sleek, premium look. The colors are carefully blended—white for neutrality and lightness, black for focus, and blue for highlights—making this palette ideal for a crisp, modern ad banner.
